author: jmason
msg: removed one-match-per-IP code, which seems like a bizarre idea; and fixed an undef warning

author: jmason
msg: massive DNS functionality improvement.  Some DNSBLs were being missed, due to all of them sharing 'relay' for a zone id, fixed; DNSBL lookups now use TXT records on the zones that support it, and log that in the report; DNSBL lookup code simplified; removed obsolete dialup_codes functionality; added lookups for formmail and proxies.relays.monkeys.org.

author: quinlan
msg: major improvements to HTML bgcolor code
add a few more named colors to color hash

author: quinlan
msg: add T_HTML_FONT_COLOR_NAME as possible replacement rule
